articles.description: There's a question often asked in the Quinn household, the sentiment of which will be immediately understood by any Sunderland supporter.
articles.content:

articles.title: Mansfield Town: Manager Nigel Clough says pitch invasions are 'getting concerning' - BBC
articles.description: Mansfield boss Nigel Clough says pitch invasions are "getting concerning" after a Stags player was apparently shoved by a fan at Northampton.
articles.content:
